verbs.description: [ARG1: US President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: appeared] [C-ARG1: to dial back a promise to withdraw US troops from Syria immediately , saying it was important to not allow Iranian influence to grow in the country] .

[ARG0: US President Donald Trump] on Tuesday appeared to [V: dial] back [ARG1: a promise to withdraw US troops from Syria immediately] , saying it was important to not allow Iranian influence to grow in the country .

US President Donald Trump on Tuesday appeared to dial back a promise to [V: withdraw] [ARG1: US troops] [ARG2: from Syria] [ARGM-TMP: immediately] , saying it was important to not allow Iranian influence to grow in the country .

[ARG0: US President Donald Trump] on Tuesday appeared to dial back a promise to withdraw US troops from Syria immediately , [V: saying] [ARG1: it was important to not allow Iranian influence to grow in the country] .

US President Donald Trump on Tuesday appeared to dial back a promise to withdraw US troops from Syria immediately , saying it [V: was] [ARG2: important] [ARG1: to not allow Iranian influence to grow in the country] .

US President Donald Trump on Tuesday appeared to dial back a promise to withdraw US troops from Syria immediately , saying it was important to [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: allow] [ARG1: Iranian influence to grow in the country] .

US President Donald Trump on Tuesday appeared to dial back a promise to withdraw US troops from Syria immediately , saying it was important to not allow [ARG1: Iranian influence] to [V: grow] [ARGM-LOC: in the country] .
